Title: Hold high the red banner, build up the iron wall of steel -- First of four propaganda posters commemorating the 20th anniversary of Chairman Mao's instruction to "organize contingents of the people's militia on a big scale"
Designer: Political Department of the Shanxi Provincial Military Region (山西省军区政治部)Propaganda Department of the Shanxi Provincial Communist Party Committee (中共山西省委宣传部)
Notes: First of four "Propaganda posters in commemoration of the twentieth anniversary of Chairman Mao's instruction to 'organize contingents of the people's militia on a big scale'"
